speaker: YOU
text: Information. I'm looking into the Marlowe case.

speaker: MICKEY
text: Eleanor? She was in here last night. Looked scared. Kept watching the door.

speaker: MICKEY
text: She was meeting someone. Big guy, gray suit. Expensive. They argued.

speaker: MICKEY
text: Didn't catch one. But he dropped a business card when he left. I still got it.
